short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to log work into jira

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension can be used to register work into jira tasks without entering to your company's jira webpage. You just need to add the hostname of the jira webpage and the tasks where you usualy register work, for example daily meetings, current working task, refinements or bugs and you can register work with just one click on each task.
The extension only stores the jira url and the tasks, any other credentials or authentication needed must be done in the actual jira webpage.
